headline: Festival Republic
text: Observer ethical awards 2012 Festival Republic    Festival Republic is the UK's leading Festival and Event promoter. We are extremely proud to be the team behind the greatest rock shows on the planet; the Reading& Leeds Festival, the critically applauded Latitude,The Big Chill, Ireland's Electric Picnic, Hove in Norway and the Berlin Festival in Germany. Melvin Benn, Managing Director of Festival Republic,also has operational responsibility for andis the licence holder of Glastonbury Festival. More than half a million fans attend the festivals we own and co-produce each year. They do so because they share our passion for festivals. Festivals are in our blood and we are proud to provide the heartbeat of the summer.
